resume.explanation: For security and privacy reasons, I prefer to send my resume by email.
resume.error_message: An error occurred. Please try again or contact me directly on LinkedIn.
resume.email_body:
Hello,

Thank you for your interest. Here is the link to download the resume you requested: Download Resume.

If you have any further questions or need additional information, please don't hesitate to reach out.

Best regards,
Lucas Illiano

about.text_3: I am a backend developer passionate about technology and challenges. I have over 2 years of experience in software and website development. I have worked with technologies such as Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, MySQL, React.js, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Git, etc.

experience_1.title: Full Stack Ruby On Rails Developer

description.text_1: Feature Creation: Developing new features for web applications using Ruby on Rails, Turbo, React, RSpec, PostgreSQL, and ElasticSearch.
description.text_2: Bug Fixing: Efficiently resolving complex bugs to enhance application stability and performance.
description.text_3: Deployment and CI/CD: Setting up continuous integration and deployment pipelines with GitHub Actions, deploying on AWS (EC2, Amazon RDS, ElastiCache, CodePipeline).
description.text_4: Collaboration: Working closely with development teams to adopt best DevOps practices.
description.text_5: Autonomy: Independently managing tasks from development to production deployment.

description.text_1: Personal Server: Installation and configuration of a server on Raspberry Pi with Apache2 and Webmin.
description.text_2: Web Development: Creating dynamic websites using Ruby on Rails and Node.js.
description.text_3: Automation: Implementing continuous integration and deployment via GitHub Actions and Jenkins.
description.text_4: Server Management: Maintenance and remote administration of the server via SSH.
description.text_5: Experimentation: Exploring new technologies and practices to enhance my technical skills.

description.text_1: Collaborative Work: Participated in team projects with 5 people.
description.text_2: Cat Store: Developed an e-commerce shop in one week.
description.text_3: WhiteBoard: Created a web platform in two weeks.
description.text_4: Technologies Used: Ruby, Ruby on Rails, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, jQuery.
description.text_5: Project Management: Used Trello for task organization and tracking.
description.text_6: Skills Developed: Applied agile methodologies, strengthened full-stack development skills.

education_1.title: Bac+2 Web and Mobile Web Developer

description.text_1: Languages and Technologies studied: PHP, Symfony, Node.js, HTML, CSS, Javascript, React, MySQL, MongoDB
description.text_3: Ability to develop complete and efficient web applications.
description.text_4: Understanding of web architectures and coding best practices.

description.text_1: Intensive bootcamp focused on learning web programming through peer-learning.
description.text_2: Languages and Technologies studied: Ruby, Ruby on Rails, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, PostgreSQL
description.text_4: Achievements: Participation in several collaborative projects, applying acquired skills to real-world projects.

description.text_1: HTML/CSS: Basics of web development and responsive design.
description.text_2: Ruby: Mastery of the Ruby language for back-end development.
description.text_3: Ruby on Rails: Ability to build web applications with the Rails framework.
description.text_4: JavaScript: Skills in client-side scripting for interactive user interfaces.
description.text_5: DevOps: Knowledge of continuous integration and deployment practices.
